section.title: Testing a Web Service
section.para: A JAX-WS Web Service can be tested by using the Web Service Tester View displayed in and:

listitem.para: selecting the JAX-WS combo box option and;
entering the location of the WDSL file in the editable dropdown list or;
clicking the Get from WSDL file button and entering the URL, Eclipse workspace or File system details.
